availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, attorney. Pennsylvania native. Married to Emma Fairthorne. Attorney in Philadelphia in 1859 and 1865. Partner at Bullitt & Fairthorne, with John C. Bullitt.

ab.bibl: John Livingston, Livingston's United States Law Register, and Official Directory (New York: John Livingston, 1859), 795; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Pennsylvania, Philadelphia County, Philadelphia, Ward 10, District 29, p. 57; KYR-0001-007-0374.
